mapper.select: SELECT rownum,m.name,m.home_tel,m.cel_tel,m.com_tel,c.com_fax,m.email,c.com_name, a.area_addr1,a.area_addr2,a.area_addr3,a.area_zip,a.area_desc, a.road_addr1,a.road_addr2,a.road_addr3,a.road_no,a.road_desc FROM relation r inner join member m on r.client_id=m.id full outer join address a on a.com_no=m.com_no full outer join company c on m.com_no=c.com_no where r.id=#{id} and #{pageNum2}>=rownum and rownum>=#{pageNum1}
SELECT count(*) FROM relation WHERE mem_id=#{id}
